vote.title: Authorize a second letter amendment to the Lease Agreement between the City of Dallas and the Arena Group to (1) grant a second deferment of the due date for the Fiscal Year (FY) 2021 rent payment in the amount of $3,400,000.00 for the American Airlines Center (AAC) from a date previously requested by the Center Operating Company, L.P. from April 30, 2021 to September 30, 2021 and approved by the City Council on October 13, 2020 by letter amendment to the Lease Agreement between the City of Dallas and the Arena Group; and (2) grant a one-time deferral of the due date for the FY 2022 rent payment in the amount of $3,400,000.00 for the AAC from October 1, 2021 until  April 30, 2022 - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
vote.description: Authorize a second letter amendment to the Lease Agreement between the City of Dallas and the Arena Group to (1) grant a second deferment of the due date for the Fiscal Year (FY) 2021 rent payment in the amount of $3,400,000.00 for the American Airlines Center (AAC) from a date previously requested by the Center Operating Company, L.P. from April 30, 2021 to September 30, 2021 and approved by the City Council on October 13, 2020 by letter amendment to the Lease Agreement between the City of Dallas and the Arena Group; and (2) grant a one-time deferral of the due date for the FY 2022 rent payment in the amount of $3,400,000.00 for the AAC from October 1, 2021 until  April 30, 2022 - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
